summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SocialFire Firebase-based social media app. Login page, UI design, route protection, and responsive design all working correctly. Google Sign-in blocked by Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy in testing environment.

integration_issues.issue: Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy blocks Google Sign-in popup in testing environment
integration_issues.error_message: Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy policy would block the window.closed call
integration_issues.impact: Cannot test authenticated features through automated testing
integration_issues.workaround: Requires manual testing or Firebase Auth emulator setup

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly with proper UI elements
SocialFire title and description display correctly
Google Sign-in button is enabled and clickable
Google Sans font is properly loaded and applied
Card backdrop blur and styling working
Button styling and hover effects working
Responsive design works on mobile viewport
Route protection correctly redirects unauthenticated users to login
Terms and Privacy Policy text displayed
No JavaScript errors on login page
Page title and meta information correct
action_item_for_main_agent: Google Sign-in authentication cannot be tested in automated environment due to Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy restrictions. Consider setting up Firebase Auth emulator for testing or provide manual testing instructions. All other frontend elements are working correctly.
